13sts row 6 decrease k4 skpo k1 k2tog k4 to end of row - 11sts cast off all 11 inside mouth purl-wise b nose seam push the inner mouth in and rhino s under the right side muzzle - you won t see it once the jaw is sewn in c horn place but it adds a structure neck markers fig 5 fig 6 baby rhino page 12 baby rhino page 13 back row 9 purl rs facing with head toward you begin at rhino s left neck marker row 10 k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 26sts with yarn a pick up and knit 4 sts along the left side of the head row row 11-12 decrease repeat last 2 row once - 24sts ends to corner of the 18 stitches held on the safety pin or circular row 13-15 beginning with a purl row work three row stocking stitch needle slip all 18 head back onto a knitting needle ready to knit across work short row to shape left thigh as follows and k4 skpo k6 k2tog k4 pick up and knit 4 sts along row ends at the short row 1 increase cast on 3 sts pm for left thigh marker k7 w+tk right side of the head to right neck marker see fig 7 work as dotted short row 2 p1 w+tp line - pick up and knit a to b knit b to c pick up and knit c to d - 24sts short row 3 k2 w+tk c short row 4 p3 w+tp b short row 5 k4 w+tk short row 6 p5 w+tp short row 7 k6 w+tk d a short row 8 p10 to end rhino s row 16 decrease k11 skpo k4 k2tog k8 to end - 25sts right side horn work short row to shape right thigh as follows short row 1 increase cast on 3 sts pm for right thigh marker p7 w+tp short row 2 k1 w+tk fig 7 short row 3 p2 w+tp row 1 3 5 & 7 purl short row 4 k3 w+tk row 2 increase kfb knit to last st kfb - 26sts short row 5 p4 w+tp row 4 kfb k7 skpo k6 k2tog k7 kfb short row 6 k5 w+tk row 6 increase k9 kfb k6 kfb k9 to end - 28sts short row 7 p6 w+tp row 8 k2tog k8 kfb k6 kfb knit to last 2 sts k2tog short row 8 k10 to end baby rhino page 14 baby rhino page 15 row 17 p28 sts row 10 purl row 18 decrease k10 skpo k4 k2tog k10 to end -
